title: Leisure Life of Princess Yu Yu - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Horror   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Astrologers   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Cooking   Cultivation   Cute Children   Divination   Familial Love   Family   Farming   Female Protagonist   Feng Shui   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Overpowered Protagonist   Pregnancy   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R*pe   Transmigration
author: 柔桡轻曼
description:
YuYu was a Princess from the Wei dynasty. When other girls of her age learned music, embroidery, dance, and poetry Princess YuYu learned metaphysics. She was proficient in all the divisions of metaphysics. With her knowledge in metaphysics, YuYu learned that the Wei dynasty was coming to end and found that the dragon vein was broken. To repair the dragon vein and to stop the dynasty from ending YuYu sacrificed herself for the people who loved her.

For her great sacrifice, heaven has given her a chance she crossed through years and reincarnated into a college girl.>
